<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-c">#Header code, setup required libraries</span>
library(<span class="pl-smi">ggplot2</span>)
library(<span class="pl-smi">plyr</span>)</pre></div>

<h2>
<a id="user-content-loading-and-preprocessing-the-data" class="anchor" href="#loading-and-preprocessing-the-data" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Loading and preprocessing the data</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-c">#Loading from csv</span>
<span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>read.csv(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>activity.csv<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-v">colClasses</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>integer<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Date<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>integer<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>))

<span class="pl-c">##Calculate # steps per day</span>
<span class="pl-smi">numStepsPerDay</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ddply(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>, c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>date<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),<span class="pl-smi">summarise</span>,<span class="pl-v">totalsteps</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>sum(<span class="pl-smi">steps</span>,<span class="pl-v">na.rm</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>))

<span class="pl-c">##Calculate # steps at 5mins intervals</span>
<span class="pl-smi">numStepsPer5MinInterval</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ddply(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>, c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>interval<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),<span class="pl-smi">summarise</span>,<span class="pl-v">meansteps</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> mean(<span class="pl-smi">steps</span>,<span class="pl-v">na.rm</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>))
</pre></div>

<h2>
<a id="user-content-what-is-mean-total-number-of-steps-taken-per-day" class="anchor" href="#what-is-mean-total-number-of-steps-taken-per-day" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>What is mean total number of steps taken per day?</h2>

<p>Mean total number of steps taken per day: <code>r mean(numStepsPerDay$totalsteps, na.rm=TRUE)</code>.  Median total number of steps taken per day: <code>r median(numStepsPerDay$totalsteps)</code>.</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">stepshist</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ggplot(<span class="pl-smi">numStepsPerDay</span>,aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">totalsteps</span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span>geom_histogram()<span class="pl-k">+</span>
  xlab(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Total number of steps<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> ggtitle(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Total # steps per day<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> theme_bw()
print(<span class="pl-smi">stepshist</span>)</pre></div>

<h2>
<a id="user-content-what-is-the-average-daily-activity-pattern" class="anchor" href="#what-is-the-average-daily-activity-pattern" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>What is the average daily activity pattern?</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">dayline</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ggplot(<span class="pl-smi">numStepsPer5MinInterval</span>,aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">interval</span>,<span class="pl-v">y</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">meansteps</span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span>geom_line()<span class="pl-k">+</span>
  ggtitle(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Average # steps per 5-min interval<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> ylab(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Mean steps<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> theme_bw()
print(<span class="pl-smi">dayline</span>)</pre></div>

<p>-- Alternative daily activity pattern visualisation, raw points with a loess curve</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">dayraw</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ggplot(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>,aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">interval</span>,<span class="pl-v">y</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">steps</span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span>geom_point(<span class="pl-v">alpha</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>.<span class="pl-c1">1</span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span>geom_smooth()<span class="pl-k">+</span>
  ggtitle(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Steps in each 5-min interval, raw points + loess curve<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span>
  theme_bw()
print(<span class="pl-smi">dayraw</span>)</pre></div>

<p>Max mean # steps within 5-min interval: <code>r numStepsPer5MinInterval[which(numStepsPer5MinInterval$meansteps==max(numStepsPer5MinInterval$meansteps)), "interval"]</code> with a mean of <code>r numStepsPer5MinInterval[which(numStepsPer5MinInterval$meansteps==max(numStepsPer5MinInterval$meansteps)), "meansteps"]</code> steps.</p>

<h2>
<a id="user-content-imputing-missing-values" class="anchor" href="#imputing-missing-values" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Imputing missing values</h2>

<p>Number of <code>r nrow(activity)-sum(complete.cases(activity))</code> incomplete records distributed through the data.</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre>hist(which(complete.cases(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>)),
     <span class="pl-v">main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Count of complete cases (chronological order)<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,
     <span class="pl-v">xlab</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Observation number<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,
     <span class="pl-v">ylab</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Count of complete cases<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
     )
</pre></div>

<p>In an attempt to produce a relatively smooth plot, we chose to perform interpolation of points immediately before and after the missing value. For cases where there are consequtive missing values, the mean 5-minute results is used instead.</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-c">#q3</span>
<span class="pl-en">step_interpolation</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-k">function</span>(<span class="pl-smi">rownumber</span>){
  <span class="pl-v">prevrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">rownumber</span>;
  <span class="pl-v">nextrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">rownumber</span>;
  <span class="pl-k">while</span>(is.na(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">steps</span>[<span class="pl-smi">prevrow</span>])){
    <span class="pl-v">prevrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">prevrow</span><span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>
    <span class="pl-k">if</span>(<span class="pl-smi">prevrow</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>)<span class="pl-k">return</span>(mean(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>[<span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">interval</span><span class="pl-k">==</span><span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">interval</span>[<span class="pl-smi">rownumber</span>],<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>steps<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>],<span class="pl-v">na.rm</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>))
  }
  <span class="pl-k">while</span>(is.na(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">steps</span>[<span class="pl-smi">nextrow</span>])){
    <span class="pl-v">nextrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">nextrow</span><span class="pl-k">+</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>
    <span class="pl-k">if</span>(<span class="pl-smi">nextrow</span><span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>nrow(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>))<span class="pl-k">return</span>(mean(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>[<span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">interval</span><span class="pl-k">==</span><span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">interval</span>[<span class="pl-smi">rownumber</span>],<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>steps<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>],<span class="pl-v">na.rm</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>))
  }
  <span class="pl-k">return</span>(
    (<span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">steps</span>[<span class="pl-smi">prevrow</span>]<span class="pl-k">+</span><span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">steps</span>[<span class="pl-smi">nextrow</span>])<span class="pl-k">/</span><span class="pl-c1">2</span>
  )
}

<span class="pl-smi">activity_guessNA</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span><span class="pl-smi">activity</span>
<span class="pl-k">for</span>(<span class="pl-smi">n</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span><span class="pl-k">:</span>nrow(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span>)){
  <span class="pl-k">if</span>(is.na(<span class="pl-smi">activity</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">steps</span>[<span class="pl-smi">n</span>])){
    <span class="pl-smi">activity_guessNA</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">steps</span>[<span class="pl-smi">n</span>]<span class="pl-k">=</span>step_interpolation(<span class="pl-smi">n</span>);
  }
}</pre></div>

<p>NB: Upon discussion with other course peers, we would like to propose using density plot here instead of histogram for better differentiation of the 2 plots. </p>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">stepsperday2</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>merge(
  ddply(<span class="pl-smi">activity_guessNA</span>, c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>date<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),<span class="pl-smi">summarise</span>,
        <span class="pl-v">guesstotalsteps</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>sum(<span class="pl-smi">steps</span>,<span class="pl-v">na.rm</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>)
  ),
  <span class="pl-smi">numStepsPerDay</span>,
  <span class="pl-v">by</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>date<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
)

<span class="pl-smi">guesscheck</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ggplot(<span class="pl-smi">stepsperday2</span>,aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">totalsteps</span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span> geom_density()<span class="pl-k">+</span> geom_density(aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">guesstotalsteps</span>,<span class="pl-v">color</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Imputed<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span> ggtitle(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Density plot comparison of raw and imputed data<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> xlab(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>total # steps<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> theme_bw()
print(<span class="pl-smi">guesscheck</span>)</pre></div>

<p>Represented in Histogram:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">forpeoplewhoreallywanttoseeahistogram</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ggplot(<span class="pl-smi">stepsperday2</span>,aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">guesstotalsteps</span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span> geom_histogram()<span class="pl-k">+</span> ggtitle(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Total number of steps/day with imputed missing values<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> theme_bw()
print(<span class="pl-smi">forpeoplewhoreallywanttoseeahistogram</span>)</pre></div>

<p>Mean # steps: <code>r mean(stepsperday2$totalsteps,na.rm=TRUE)</code>  Median # steps: <code>r median(stepsperday2$totalsteps,na.rm=TRUE)</code>.  Imputed mean # steps: <code>r mean(stepsperday2$guesstotalsteps,na.rm=TRUE)</code>  Imputed median # steps: <code>r median(stepsperday2$guesstotalsteps,na.rm=TRUE)</code>. </p>

<h2>
<a id="user-content-are-there-differences-in-activity-patterns-between-weekdays-and-weekends" class="anchor" href="#are-there-differences-in-activity-patterns-between-weekdays-and-weekends" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Are there differences in activity patterns between weekdays and weekends?</h2>

<p>It has been observed that there's significant increase in activities over  weekends.</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-v">paindays</span><span class="pl-k">=</span> c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Monday<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Tuesday<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Wednesday<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Thursday<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Friday<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)

<span class="pl-smi">activity_guessNA</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">weekday</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>as.factor(ifelse(weekdays(<span class="pl-smi">activity_guessNA</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">date</span>)<span class="pl-k">%in%</span><span class="pl-smi">paindays</span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>weekday<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>weekend<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>))

<span class="pl-smi">stepsperinterval.weekdaysplit</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ddply(<span class="pl-smi">activity_guessNA</span>, c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>interval<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>weekday<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),<span class="pl-smi">summarise</span>,<span class="pl-v">meansteps</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> mean(<span class="pl-smi">steps</span>,<span class="pl-v">na.rm</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>))

<span class="pl-smi">weekdayplot</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>ggplot(<span class="pl-smi">stepsperinterval.weekdaysplit</span>,aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">interval</span>,<span class="pl-v">y</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">meansteps</span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span> facet_wrap(<span class="pl-k">~</span><span class="pl-smi">weekday</span>,<span class="pl-v">nrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2</span>,<span class="pl-v">ncol</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> geom_line()<span class="pl-k">+</span> theme_bw()<span class="pl-k">+</span> ggtitle(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Weekday &amp; Weekend representation of Mean # steps at 5-min interval<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> ylab(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Mean # steps<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span> xlab(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Interval<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
print(<span class="pl-smi">weekdayplot</span>)</pre></div>
</article>
  </div>
